messages.placeholder: (waiting to check the status; click the Check Status button to check immediately)
messages.uptodate: As of {time}, the catalog is up to date.
messages.behind: As of {time}, the catalog requires an update.
messages.ahead: As of {time}, it seems that you are doing your own version control.
messages.unable: As of {time}, we are unable to determine the catalog status due to a server-side error.
messages.foreword:
Upon refresh, we will pull the latest examples from GitHub.
After the refresh, you will lose any changes you have made to the demos and any data that your demo runs may have generated.
messages.lastCheck: Server-side time of last status check
